name: The Siege of Castle Steinhaufen
description:
This is an ANTI-match-3 game... in other words, you want to prevent your blocks from being cleared for as long as possible! Full instructions are in-game.

No HTML5 version this time because the AI requires threading and browsers don't fully support that yet.

Note for non-QWERTY keyboards: To rotate your blocks, use the two letter keys at the bottom left of the keyboard. These keys are Z/X on a QWERTY layout (which is why the instructions say Z/X), but they might be W/X, Y/X, or something else depending on your keyboard.

Thanks to Dino0040 for the leaderboard server!

Art assets used:

Castlevania-esque Tilemap (Stone and Bricks) by Chayed Creates

Grass/Dirt [Connecting Tileset] [16x16] by KnoblePersona

Mage Rework by Wolfgang Wozniak (Ouren) & Jordan Irwin (AntumDeluge)

Mini Fantasy Sprites by GrafxKid

Music used:

Leafless Quince Tree by Rolemusic
